Title: Magadheera
Writer: Vijayendra Prasad (story), S.S. Rajamouli (screenplay), S.S. Rajamouli, M. Rathnam (dialogue)
Actors: Kajal Aggarwal, Dev Gill, Srihari, Sarath Babu
Plot: A bike stuntman recalls his previous life as a warrior, and pursues his love's reincarnation. A sinister figure from their shared past threatens to separate them forever.
